alert.note: Alert for Richland; Roosevelt (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 3:19PM MDT until July 06 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Roosevelt County in northeastern Montana... Northeastern Richland County in northeastern Montana... * Until 415 PM MDT. * At 319 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Culbertson, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Culbertson, Bainville, Mccabe, Nohly, Snowden and Fort Union. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
